item.title: EP 483 - Haunted India
item.itunes:title: Haunted India
item.description:
Today we look at a string of murders in Australia and then we visit India to check out some of their most haunted places!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Minecraft Server Is Back!


147.135.54.93:25879

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

“Ouija Flyer” By Robert Paulsen

https://imgur.com/gallery/CdJymvZ

 

 

Links:

 

Arrest made in American man's fatal fall off Australia cliff in 1988

https://www.foxnews.com/world/american-mans-fatal-fall-off-australia-cliff-in-1988-leads-to-arrest

 

Man charged in 1988 cold case killing of gay American who plunged from Australian cliff

https://www.kiro7.com/news/trending/man-charged-1988-cold-case-killing-gay-american-who-plunged-australian-cliff/U5WEC3UJEFEXBHB67KNPT467QM/

 

Scott Johnson's accused gay hate killer 'wasn't surprised' by arrest, police say

https://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-05-13/scott-johnson-accused-killer-wasnt-surprised-by-arrest/12241442

 

The moment that inspired Steve Johnson to find his brother’s killer

https://www.smh.com.au/national/nsw/the-moment-that-inspired-steve-johnson-to-find-his-brother-s-killer-20200512-p54sbr.html

 

Scott Johnson's accused gay hate killer 'wasn't surprised' by arrest, police say

https://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-05-13/scott-johnson-accused-killer-wasnt-surprised-by-arrest/12241442

 

How informant sparked arrest in Scott Johnson's gay hate murder cold case

https://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-05-13/scott-johnson-murder-man-charged-after-brothers-crusade/12238728

 

Man charged over 1988 cold case murder of Scott Johnson in Sydney

https://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-05-12/nsw-police-arrest-scott-johnson-murder-suspect-arrested/12237598

 

Bone Curdling Adventures At India’s Most Haunted Places

https://www.oyorooms.com/travel-guide/haunted-places-in-india/

 

Bhangarh Fort where souls wake up as the sun sets

https://hindi.oneindia.com/news/2011/07/26/bhangarh-most-haunted-place-india-aid0154.html

 

Bhangarh Fort where souls wake up as the sun sets

https://hindi.oneindia.com/news/2011/07/26/bhangarh-most-haunted-place-india-aid0154.html

 

Bhangarh: the most haunted fort in India

https://www.thehindu.com/opinion/columns/the-most-haunted-fort-in-india/article20231373.ece

 

The ghosts that haunt a Mumbai riot victim

https://www.hindustantimes.com/india/the-ghosts-that-haunt-a-mumbai-riot-victim/story-UNh7QpRyGhZmjk6V5V4oaJ.html

 

Lambi Dehar Mines In Mussoorie - Travel To The Mine Of Death

https://www.nativeplanet.com/travel-guide/lambi-dehar-mines-in-mussoorie-travel-to-the-mine-of-death-002558.html

 

Lambi Dehar Mine: Screaming with the pain of 50,000 worker

https://www.tripoto.com/uttarakhand/trips/lambi-dehar-mine-screaming-with-the-pain-of-50-000-worker-58a831a0433e9

 

These 10 Most Haunted Places in India Will Send a Chill Down Your Spine!

https://www.india.com/travel/articles/these-10-most-haunted-places-in-india-will-send-a-chill-down-your-spine-3232709/

 

Malcha Mahal

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Malcha_Mahal

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

 

Logo Art By Ash Black

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

Dead Rabbit Exposed By Smashers_25 (Instagram)

Halloween Monster By Finn

Ouija By Robert Paulson

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Reptilian Strip Song EP 374: “Empty Beds”

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
